A linear combination <math display="inline">\alpha_{1}\vec{v}_{1}  +  \alpha_{2}\vec{v}_{2}  +  \dotsb  +  \alpha_{n - 1}\vec{v}_{n - 1}  +  \alpha_{n}\vec{v}_{n}</math> is called non-negative when <math display="block">\alpha_{1}, \alpha_{2},  \dots ,\alpha_{n - 1},\alpha_{n} \ge 0</math>
